properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 10:56PM EST until February 9 at 9:28AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the South Fork Catawba River
At Lowell affecting Gaston County...

.Runoff from previous heavy rain will result in the river remaining
above flood stage.

The Flood Warning continues for the South Fork Catawba River At Lowell.
* until Sunday morning.
* At 10:45 PM Thursday the stage was 15.4 feet.
* Minor Flood Stage is 10.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Major flooding is forecast.
* FORECAST: The river will continue rising to near 16.2 feet by
Friday morning. The river will fall below Minor Flood Stage
Saturday night.
* Impact...At 15.5 feet...Major Flood Stage. Floodwaters may be
inundating the Cramerton Fire Department, Cramerton Drug Store,
South Fork Masonic Lodge, and adjacent homes and businesses along
8th Avenue and North Main St.  Floodwaters also may be approaching
the Cramerton Police Department. Flooding of Duharts Creek may be
impacting adjacent sections of Mayflower Rd., and Cramer Mountain Rd.
may be inundated with several inches of water.
properties.instruction:
Please report high water...flooding and landslides to the National
Weather Service Greenville-Spartanburg by calling toll free...1...8 0
0...2 6 7...8 1 0 1...or by posting on our Facebook page...or tweet
it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and
the specific location where it occurred.
